de: Ein schwerer Schneesturm stört den Reiseverkehr im Süden der USA. Ein heftiger Schneesturm im Süden der USA bringt Temperaturen unter Null mit sich, was in mehreren Bundesstaaten zu weit verbreiteten Reiseunterbrechungen, Flugausfällen und Stromausfällen führt. Lesen Sie mehr: https://punchng.com/severe-snowstorm-disrupts-travel-across-southern-us/
title: Severe snowstorm disrupts travel across Southern US
description:
A severe Southern US snowstorm brings subzero temps, causing widespread travel disruption, flight cancellations, and power outages across several states.

Read More: https://punchng.com/severe-snowstorm-disrupts-travel-across-southern-us/
en:
Severe snowstorm disrupts travel across Southern US. A severe Southern US snowstorm brings subzero temps, causing widespread travel disruption, flight cancellations, and power outages across several states.

la: Gravis nivis disrupts iter trans Southern US. Gravis tempestas meridionalis US subzero tentationes adfert, diffusa turbationem peregrinationem, fugam cancellations et potestatem outages per plures civitates. Lege More: https://punchng.com/severe-snowstorm-disrupts-travel-across-southern-us/
content:
Travel misery was set to continue Sunday as a powerful snowstorm blasted southern US states, bringing subzero temperatures to regions not accustomed to the deadly winter conditions.
